ive purchased items amazon years rarely write reviews felt compelled write one although reviews point never seen good product get bad reviews im hoping people purchase star rating accurate product ill address three biggest complaints ive read otherssound quality think headphones sound great ive never owned expensive pair im able compare higherend offerings ive owned dozens cheap midrange headphones range im audiophile musician im missing something coming isnt im fine ignorance would say theyre slightly better apples buds liked much used years recently using redesigned ones year theres tinny listening sound thats alltoocommon headphones price range far people saying dont compare apples buds well dont know maybe crazy exclusive version apples buds amazing compared regular earpods think amazons headphones actually sound bit better provide nice full sound represent highs lows mids equally well mainly listening metalfit feel people complained falling feeling like theyre going fall ears theres validity although obviously depends specific ears dont feel like theyre going fall give cord tug dont stay secure apple budsread
